expectedResult.title: Kate and Laurel Kato Floating Side Table - 18x10x9 - Black
expectedResult.description: Introducing the Kato floating side table - the perfect addition to your bedroom or living space! This modern floating nightstand is designed to add functionality and style to any room with its sleek and transitional design. The natural brown finish adds warmth and elegance to your decor, making it a versatile piece that complements various interior styles. Featuring a convenient drawer, this floating side table provides ample storage space for your essentials, such as books, remotes, and other small items. The smooth-gliding drawer ensures easy access and smooth operation, while the sturdy construction ensures durability and longevity. The floating design of this side table creates a unique and modern look, adding an aesthetic touch to your room. It is easy to install with the included hardware, making it a hassle-free addition to your home. The floating design also helps to create an illusion of more space, making it a great choice for small rooms or apartments. Made from shaped mango wood, this floating side table is built to last. The natural brown finish adds a touch of warmth and elegance to your space, while the clean lines and minimalist design make it a perfect fit for any modern or transitional decor. Measuring at 18 inches wide by 10 inches deep by 9 inches tall, this compact side table is ideal for small spaces, making it perfect for use as a bedside table or as a space-saving solution in any room. Upgrade your bedroom or living space with the Kato floating side table. Whether you use it as a floating nightstand or a sleek side table, it is sure to enhance the functionality and style of your room. Add a touch of modern sophistication to your home with this versatile and stylish floating side table!

expectedResult.title: O-Cedar EasyWring Spin Mop and Bucket System
expectedResult.description:
O-Cedar's EasyWring microfiber mop delivers a better clean by effectively removing dirt and grime just water. The EasyWring is a better way to truly clean your floors! The foot pedal on the bucket allows for hands-free wringing to prevent bending over and wet hands. Control the level of moisture on your mop with the built-in, high-quality foot pedal while Splash Guards keep the water inside the mop bucket. This is an ideal deep-cleaning solution for all hard floors, such as hardwood, tile, laminate, marble, and ceramic. It can be used wet or dry depending if floors need mopping or dusting. Everyone can use this mop as the telescopic handle adjusts to 51 inches.

*Removes over 99% of E. coli and Staph. aureus from pre-finished hardwood flooring and ceramic tile using tap water, as tested at an independent accredited lab

***The EasyWring #1 Spin Mop claim is based on IRI, Total US MULO, L52 wks 01/01/23, Consumer Focused Durable Mops dollar sales.

expectedResult.title: Singular 5200 199,000 BTU Combi Gas-Fired Wall-Hung Condensing Boiler
expectedResult.description:
Rebates:
This product qualifies for a federal tax rebate of 30% of project cost up to $600. Federal Rebate click for more info

In addition to the federal rebate, you may also be eligible for rebates from your local utility company and state. Search your zip code in the link below for information about local rebate programs that may apply to you. Bosch Rebate Center

Bosch Singular combi boilers are the "singular solution" for efficient, dependable home heating with up to 7.7 gallons per minute of domestic hot water production. Depending on incoming water temperature, Singular can run up to three showers and a dishwasher simultaneously. Singular is a wall-mounted combi boiler that can be used in many hydronic heating applications. Their small, lightweight form makes for easy installation, and the stainless steel heat exchanger system offers excellent performance at a cost-effective price. Singular is highly efficient, with a 95% AFUE rating; this makes your new system eligible for up to 75% savings in local and/or federal energy rebate programs.

Product Features
High-efficiency condensing combi wall boiler - 95% AFUE rating
Built-in boiler circulator pump
Stainless steel primary & secondary heat exchangers for cost-effective, reliable performance
All models are field convertible from NG to LP with included conversion kit
Capable of outdoor reset with accessory temperature sensor (not included)
Eco-friendly low NOx metal fiber burner
Turndown ratio up to 10:1
2" PVC vent up to 60' (3" venting up to 150')
Exhaust gas temperature sensor ensures safe operation
10-year heat exchanger, 5-year parts, and 1-year labor limited warranty

microlinkResult.title: Black+blum Glass Water Bottle 600ml Golden | Trekkinn
microlinkResult.description: Get Black+blum Glass Water Bottle 600ml in Golden for 23.99 $. Ideal for outdoor with fast delivery. Buy Cookware at Trekkinn!

expectedResult.title: Black+blum Glass Water Bottle 600ml
expectedResult.description:
A 600ml / 20 fl oz Borosilicate glass bottle with a protective non-slip sleeve, convenient carry loop and full glass and Stainless steel contact with water.

Thread Is On The Inside Of Neck:
- The thread is on the inside of the bottle so the outer lip is smooth and gives a better drinking experience

Stainless Steel Lid:
- It is strong, hard wearing, taste neutral, and it means that no plastic comes into contact with the water

Nylon Paracord Carry Loop:
- Strong, hard wearing, water and mildew resistant paracord make it easy to carry your bottle

A Word From The Designer:
- There is something lovely about drinking water from glass. It makes the water feel fresh, crisp and clean. We wanted to create a minimal bottle design that celebrated this. It was a challenge to hand blow a glass bottle with a thread on the inside, but working closely with the skilled artisan makers, we were able to achieve a spout design that was a pleasure to drink from. The stainless steel top and paracord loop give the design a utilitarian feel and the silicone sleeve provides reassuring grip and protection to offset the fragility of the glass. The end result is a pure, no nonsense design that will age well and can become your everyday

microlinkResult.title: The Octavia Course – Dr Dan Keown
microlinkResult.description: Please log in to access your purchased courses.

expectedResult.title: The Octavia Course
expectedResult.description:
The Octavia Course was designed by Dr Daniel Keown who holds dual degrees in Western and Chinese medicine.

The Octavia Course does something unique, it combines the Western understanding of how the body works within the Chinese model of The Six Divisions. We organise your understanding into the Six Divisions, and in the process you intuitively understand all the Western concepts as well. The net result is you can learn incredibly complex Western medicine, effortlessly, simply by understanding how it fits into the Six Divisions.

In this way you only have to learn one thing and then you understand the whole lot. As well as this there are two very important bonuses.

Firstly, it is super easy to understand and remember. You just have to remember six main parts of the body, the divisions, and how they behave and what they do.

Secondly, this understanding makes the practice, and most importantly, succesful practice, of acupuncture much much easier!

If you want to understand more just watch some of our free preview lessons.

microlinkResult.title: Sticky Miso Salmon Bowl Recipe
microlinkResult.description: Miso salmon is an easy meal for any night of the week but it gets taken to a whole other level here with the additions of grapefruit and honey Combining the zest and juice from the grapefruit with honey, miso and a bit of ginger gives the fish a sticky-tangy finish when broiled The sushi rice is mixed with a humble pat of butter and some sliced scallions, making it a comforting counterpart to this simple fish for an elegant weeknight dinner.

expectedResult.title: Sticky Miso Salmon Bowl Recipe
expectedResult.description: Miso salmon is an easy meal for any night of the week but it gets taken to a whole other level here with the additions of grapefruit and honey. Combining the zest and juice from the grapefruit with honey, miso and a bit of ginger gives the fish a sticky-tangy finish when broiled. The sushi rice is mixed with a humble pat of butter and some sliced scallions, making it a comforting counterpart to this simple fish for an elegant weeknight dinner.
